title: Question regarding "Language Filter"
body:
I have repeatedly turned off the language filter but for some reason words considered "Bad" still show up as "***".

I was wondering how i would go about turning it off completely.

replies.body:
We've seen some reports on the language filter not toggling properly, but a manual adjustment might help.  

- Close League of Legends
- Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\(lat est version)\deploy\preferences
- Open up the shared(summoner name).PROPERTIES file up with Notepad
- It should say:
[Chat]
EnableChatFilter=1
- Just change the 1 to a 0. Hit Ctrl+S to save it.

Let me know if that does the trick!
